alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Crawford; Grant; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Richland; Trempealeau; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 3:30PM CST until December 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Dense Fog This Afternoon in Northern Wisconsin... .Dangerous driving conditions are in place across northern Wisconsin with near zero visibility this afternoon in widespread dense fog. The dense fog could persist into the evening until a line of storms moves through. The advisory may need to be extended into the evening. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, southwest and west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds tonight could blow down trees and power lines causing power outages, possibly for a prolonged period of time. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Empty semi-trailers will run the risk of being blown over.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
